buttons.checkbox_1: I understand the importance of securing crypto with a hardware device.
buttons.checkbox_2: I understand that using hot wallets on a laptop or phone leaves you vulnerable to malware.

landing.paragraph_1: Hot wallets are great for trading, but they leave you exposed to malware, phishing, and scams. A true cold wallet, secured with a hardware device and kept free of token approvals, is the safest way to protect your NFTs and tokens long-term.
landing.paragraph_2: That's why Revoke.cash and Pudgy Penguins are releasing the Cold Storage Soulbound Token (SBT). By revoking approvals and showing that you understand the importance of cold storage, you can earn a badge that proves your commitment to wallet hygiene and security practices.

eligible.description: Nice work - your wallet is clean and ready! To finish earning your Cold Storage Soulbound Token, complete the short quiz below and show you understand the power of cold storage.
eligible.title: ğŸ‰ You're eligible - Complete the quiz

has_allowances.description: Your wallet still has active token approvals, which leaves it vulnerable to scams, and makes it no longer a cold wallet. To qualify for this Soulbound Token, revoke your approvals or move your assets to a wallet with no approvals and try again.
has_allowances.title: âŒ Active approvals detected

no_tokens.description: This Soulbound Token is just for the Pudgy Penguins community to start with. To be eligible, your wallet needs to hold a Pudgy Penguin or Lil Pudgy. ğŸ§ Grab one and come back to claim your Cold Storage badge, or wait until we open it up to the rest of the crypto community!
